deathtouch.name: Deathtouch
deathtouch.definition: Any amount of damage this creature deals to another creature is enough to destroy it.

double strike.name: Double Strike
double strike.definition: This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.

first strike.name: First Strike
first strike.definition: This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.

flash.name: Flash
flash.definition: You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.

flying.name: Flying
flying.definition: This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

haste.name: Haste
haste.definition: This creature can attack and tap as soon as it comes under your control.

hexproof.name: Hexproof
hexproof.definition: This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

indestructible.name: Indestructible
indestructible.definition: Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this permanent. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.

lifelink.name: Lifelink
lifelink.definition: Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.

menace.name: Menace
menace.definition: This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

reach.name: Reach
reach.definition: This creature can block creatures with flying.

trample.name: Trample
trample.definition: This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

vigilance.name: Vigilance
vigilance.definition: Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.

ward.name: Ward
ward.definition: Whenever this permanent becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays the ward cost.

affinity.name: Affinity
affinity.definition: This spell costs you less to cast for each permanent you control of the specified type.

cascade.name: Cascade
cascade.definition: When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with lesser mana value. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.

convoke.name: Convoke
convoke.definition: Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.

cycling.name: Cycling
cycling.definition: You may pay the cycling cost and discard this card to draw a card.

delve.name: Delve
delve.definition: Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for 1.

equip.name: Equip
equip.definition: Attach this Equipment to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.

flashback.name: Flashback
flashback.definition: You may cast this card from your graveyard by paying its flashback cost. Then exile it.

kicker.name: Kicker
kicker.definition: You may pay an additional cost as you cast this spell. If the kicker cost was paid, the spell has additional or alternative effects.

prowess.name: Prowess
prowess.definition: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

scry.name: Scry
scry.definition: Look at the top N cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.

storm.name: Storm
storm.definition: When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.

commander ninjutsu.name: Commander Ninjutsu
commander ninjutsu.definition: Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand or the command zone tapped and attacking.

eminence.name: Eminence
eminence.definition: This ability functions as long as this card is in the command zone or on the battlefield.

partner.name: Partner
partner.definition: You can have two commanders if both have partner.

companion.name: Companion
companion.definition: If this card is your chosen companion, you may cast it once from outside the game.

enchant.name: Enchant
enchant.definition: Target a permanent of the specified type. This Aura can enchant only that type of permanent.

protection.name: Protection
protection.definition: This permanent can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by sources with the stated quality.

mutate.name: Mutate
mutate.definition: If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.

ninjutsu.name: Ninjutsu
ninjutsu.definition: Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.

escape.name: Escape
escape.definition: You may cast this card from your graveyard by paying its escape cost rather than its mana cost.

foretell.name: Foretell
foretell.definition: During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. You may cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.

disturb.name: Disturb
disturb.definition: You may cast this card transformed from your graveyard for its disturb cost.

daybound.name: Daybound
daybound.definition: If it's night and no spells were cast on your last turn, this transforms as it enters. If it's day and a player casts two or more spells during their turn, it becomes night.

nightbound.name: Nightbound
nightbound.definition: If it's day and a player casts no spells during their turn, it becomes night. If it's night and a player casts two or more spells during their turn, it becomes day.

bloodthirst.name: Bloodthirst
bloodthirst.definition: If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters with N +1/+1 counters on it.

exalted.name: Exalted
exalted.definition: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

explore.name: Explore
explore.definition: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.

fabricate.name: Fabricate
fabricate.definition: When this creature enters, put N +1/+1 counters on it or create N 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.

hideaway.name: Hideaway
hideaway.definition: When this permanent enters, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in any order.

improvise.name: Improvise
improvise.definition: Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for 1.

madness.name: Madness
madness.definition: If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.

mentor.name: Mentor
mentor.definition: Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.

persist.name: Persist
persist.definition: When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.

undying.name: Undying
undying.definition: When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

riot.name: Riot
riot.definition: This creature enters with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.

shroud.name: Shroud
shroud.definition: This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities.

suspend.name: Suspend
suspend.definition: Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay its suspend cost and exile it with N time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.

transmute.name: Transmute
transmute.definition: Pay the transmute cost, discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

toxic.name: Toxic
toxic.definition: Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get N poison counters.
